summary: E-commerce application with product categories (Lehenga, Jewellery) and admin panel
architectural_notes: Admin panel with full access control

existing_features.title: Add 'Jewellery' as a new product category option in the CategoryFilter component alongside existing categories (All, Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga)
Add 'Jewellery' as a category option in the ProductForm component dropdown for adding and editing products
Add Jewellery category card to the Home page category preview section alongside Sarees, Western Wear, and Lehenga cards
Update ProductCard component to include jewellery in category-based fallback image logic

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the backend ProductCategory enum in main.mo to include #jewellery variant
